titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Latvian subject collection
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Ronald Bulatoff; machine-readable finding aid created by Xiuzhi Zhou

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-04-23T12:35-0700

did.abstract: Serial issues, election campaign literature, bulletins, newsletters, pamphlets, other printed matter, and video tapes, relating to various aspects of Latvian history, and especially to the movement culminating in re-establishment of Latvian independence in 1991, and to subsequent Latvian politics and elections.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Latvian subject collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Serial issues, election campaign literature, bulletins, newsletters, pamphlets, other printed matter, and video tapes, relating to various aspects of Latvian history, and especially to the movement culminating in re-establishment of Latvian independence in 1991, and to subsequent Latvian politics and elections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Articles, clippings, reports, printed matter, leaflets, and other materials. Arranged alphabetically by subject.

did.unittitle: Description. Sinka, Juris, Latvia and Latvians, London,
"Latvia, 1918-1940: Lectures by J. Grinbergs and A. L. Prams," London, 1952. Printed study
Journal of the National Independence Movement of Latvia (LNNK), 1990:
"Report On a Fact-Finding Mission to Riga, Latvia, " by Ibrahima Fall, Director of the Centre for Human Rights
Report cards for students in schools for Latvian refugees,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Magazines and newspapers published in Latvia and abroad. Arranged alphabetically by title.

did.unittitle: Latvijas Republikas Augstakas Padomes Un Valdibas Zinotajs (Riga), Nos. 6-9, 34/35
Latvijas Zalas Partijas Vestnesis (Riga), Nos. 4, 10; Nos. 12, 13

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This addition to the collection has not yet been described. Please let the Hoover Institution Archives know if you would like to see this material described. Contact us at hooverarchivesinfo@stanford.edu
